paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a heterozygous mutation in the KCNH2 gene associated with Uhl's disease in siblings.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The case of a 1-month-old child who died suddenly of Uhl’s disease.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Died at about 1 month of age from suspected Uhl’s disease.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A sister had died at the age of 1 month from suspected Uhl’s disease.

functional_data.summary: The variant is described in association with autosomal dominant long QT syndrome type 2.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation was found in both siblings, suggesting potential segregation with disease.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation is generally related to long QT syndrome but could also play a role in Uhl's disease.
key_quotes: This variant, present in dbSNP (rs199473427), is described in association with autosomal dominant long QT syndrome type 2.
It is possible that the observed mutation played a role in the onset of the disease process.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the KCNH2 variant was extracted from the main text.
